disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your Jumpseller store
disconnected.subtitle: Integrate all information from your Jumpseller Customers into your Doppler Lists automatically. Do you have any doubts? Press
disconnected.login_placeholder: Put the Login of your Jumpseller store
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with your Jumpseller store please try again later.

connected.title: Your Jumpseller store is already connected with Doppler
connected.subtitle: From now on you can syncronize your products with Doppler Templates, and send promotional Campaigns to your Contacts.
connected.list_title: Select the List to synchronize with Jumpseller
connected.list_subtitle: Information about your Jumpseller customers will be saved in the List you choose.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: By confirming this disconnection, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your Jumpseller account. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

actions_needed.validation-needed: No puedes seleccionar la Lista porque tienes que validar tu identidad en Jumpseller. Presiona el siguiente link para terminar las validaciones requeridas. {{ link }}
actions_needed.signature-needed: No puedes seleccionar la Lista porque tienes que firmar los terminos y condiciones de Jumpseller. Presiona el siguiente link para terminar las validaciones requeridas. {{ link }}

mapping.title: Map fields
mapping.subtitle: Take benefit of the data from your contacts in other apps to expand your Doppler list. If you canâ€™t find the same field among the options you can personalize it or omit it.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! There must be at least one Email field selected.
